name: Nethmi Sathsarani
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Happy Valentine’s Day, Nethmi! 🌹💕 I just wanted to let you know how much I enjoy spending time with you and getting to know you. You bring so much joy and warmth into my life, and I'm grateful for every moment we share. It doesn’t matter how many days it takes I will always waiting for you. Because I Love You💓. I love you in every universe ❤️‍🔥🌎
